title: (x) Exact version of Garamond? - Adobe Garamond {Lex}
content:
Hi all,

Do you have any idea what exactly this Garamond-like font (image is attached) vendor (or manufacturer, foundry, etc) and its VERSION is?

Any advance would be much appreciated

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181553im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Garamond_6152.jpg)

 [‹ Imprimerie F.Schmidt, 1908](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181553/http:/typophile.com/node/37716 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Someecards website light sans - Gill Sans {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071017181553/http:/typophile.com/node/37723 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tomcenjerrym

comments.content:
Yeah, confirmed: Adobe Garamond (Pro) regular by Robert Slimbach, as being shipped with Adobe CS2, for instance.  
F
